channel.title: CVE Feed for ASUS -- Armoury Crate Service

item.title: CVE-2022-38699|2024-08-03T11:02:14.548Z -- asus -- armoury%20crate%20service
item.description: Armoury Crate Serviceâ€™s logging function has insufficient validation to check if the log file is a symbolic link. A physical attacker with general user privilege can modify the log file property to a symbolic link that points to arbitrary system file, causing the logging function to overwrite the system file and disrupt the system.
